short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lightweight extension to create your own new tab page with your favorite websites and apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create your own new Tab page by adding custom Websites to the page. This way you can get to where you want quicker while using a very lightweight App that won't slow you down.
